description:
Miku and Riina are concerned with improving as a unit to get ready for “Cinderella’s Ball,” despite their usual clashes over the direction of the unit. Meanwhile, Riina becomes friends with a rock idol she admires, Natsuki Kimura, whom Executive Director
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If You`re Lost, Let`s Sing Aloud!
